shows.title: Sabbath: the Hidden Heartbeat of Our Lives
shows.desc:
Join Nicola Slee on a reflective walk into the woods of deep Sabbath. Using her own words alongside Wendell Berry's Sabbath poems, this evening liturgy will weave music, silence, words and imagery to create a spacious opening in the woods.

Nicola Slee is a poet and academic in the fields of feminist and practical theology, spirituality and prayer.
